title: Fragment, 1921-22-20, mid- 18th–18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on satin ground
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of red cut and uncut velvet on white satin ground. Design of small circles, each encloses a tiny branch with leaves, a bud and a blossom. Seven circles forming flower (?), in spaces between large circles.
